sketch.util.thread

Class InteractiveThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • sketch.util.thread.InteractiveThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class InteractiveThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A thread with the run() method separated into three sections: init(), run_inner(), and finish(). run_inner() will be called continuously until a stop request is enqueued on the thread.
    Author:
    gatoatigrado (nicholas tung) [email: ntung at ntung]
